page.title: 11TWO HOUSES IN GT SAMPFORD
page.content: The Mill House used to be a windmill.It was a Tower Mill.The house has used the first two floors of the mill.The roof is thatched.The rest of the house has been built from the bricks of the old blacksmith's forge which was infront of the 0ld windmill.The rooms in the old mill are octagonal.The owner has set the old cog wheels in the floor.The old mill stone makes part of the path. Free Roberts is one of the oldest houses in the area.Some of it was built in the eleventh century.It was recorded in the first Domesday Book.The house got its name because the owner had a serf called Robert.One day he gave him a house and its land because the serf saved his life.The serf called the house Free Roberts because he was now a free man.
